name: Blissful Ignorance
notes: When used in attempt to ambush it follows the normal ambush rules, allowing the target a chance to spot the attacker, Wits + Awareness against the attacker's Composure + Stealth.
description: By remaining completely still, the Garou can become invisible to others, including monitoring devices and most spirits. Any attempt to spot the Garou is done at Difficulty 2+ the Gift user's Wisdom. Movement breaks the effect. This is granted by a chameleon-spirit.

name: Crow's Laughter
notes: Upon winning the test, the target must attack the user or spend one point of Willpower to resist. This gift can also be used in homid form.
description: A target within sight and hearing can be enticed to attack the user. This is granted by a crow-spirit.

name: Spider's Song
notes: On the Gift test, a few successes give scattered words, whereas five or more (or critical wins) allow them to hear every word and possibly identify the voices. Encryption increases the Difficulty by 1 or more. This gift can also be used in homid form.
description: The Garou can eavesdrop on any long-distance verbal conversations. Landline conversations must be listened through a telephone wire or cord, to hear cellphones they only need to see the device. This is granted by a spider-spirit.

name: Umbral Pocket
notes: The item cannot be found except by those who can see into the Umbra, and can be retrieved by the Gift's user at will.
description: Send a small object hidden on one's person into the Umbra.

name: Blur of the Milky Eye
notes: This Gift ends when they directly interact with a subject, such as attack or conversation.
description: The Garou gains their Wisdom bonus to all stealth tests and physical defensive attacks. This is granted by a chameleon-spirit.

name: Open Seal
notes: The Difficulty can be 2 for regular electronic locks up to 5 for sorcery augmented fingerprint scanners. In some cases, locks may be beyond this Gift's ability to open as determined by the Storyteller.
description: Mechanical locks or bars open automatically. Electronic or supernatural devices required a Gift test with a Difficulty set by the Storyteller. This is granted by a raccoon-spirit.

name: Pulse of the Prey
notes: Supernatural or humans who are actively hiding must be tested against. Time required depends on the distance to the target and the result of the roll, supernatural ways to hide can increase the Difficulty. This gift can also be used in lupus form.
description: The werewolf can track down an individual. Humans who are not hiding do not require a Gift test to be located. This is granted by a dog-spirit.

name: Scent of Running Water
notes: They also gain their Wisdom as a bonus to avoid supernatural tracking. This Gift is free to activate, but they can spend 1 Willpower to extend the Gift's effects to their pack for one scene. This gift can also be used in lupus form.
description: The Garou can make themselves impossible to track through mundane means and difficulty through supernatural means by removing their physical evidence of passing through. This is granted by a fox-spirit.

name: Luna's Blessing
notes: Silver damage is taken, up to the Wisdom level of the user, as Superficial.
description: With the moon visible to the Garou, they howl and are no longer weak to silver. This is granted by a Lune.

name: Thieving Talons of the Magpie
duration: One turn for each Willpower spent
notes: The Gift test is made against the level of the power, such as Rank of a Gift and if another supernatural trait, the Storyteller determines it's appropriate Difficulty. The Garou is able to use it upon the next turn, using Honor as a replacement for any non-Garou traits needed.
description: The Garou can steal the supernatural powers (Gifts, vampire powers or equivalents) of others for their own use. The ability must be learned by the target and witnessed by the user. This power becomes unavailable to the original owner while in Garou's possession. Granted by magpie spirit.

name: The Thousand Forms
notes: Upon a fail, the user can attempt again by making another Rage Check and adding the successes from their previous attempt. The user keeps their Mental Attributes but their other pools depend on the shape taken. This gift can be used in any form.
description: Transform into any mundane animal, from a bear to a chicken. They are still limited in communication as when in lupus form. Particularly small, large or exotic forms may increase the Difficulty by 1 or more as determined by the Storyteller. This is granted by a Wyld-spirit.

name: Whelp Body
notes: This can be used on a target within sight and five meters. For each success from the user's margin, the target loses a single dot from one of their Physical Attributes with a minimum of 0. The effects last for the rest of the story, but can become permanent up to the Storyteller's discretion.
description: Weaken and shrivel the body of a target, the use of this Gift on another Garou is considered a dire affront. This is granted by a disease-spirit.

name: Ensnare Spirit
notes: This Gift does not work on hostile spirits and attempts to harm the spirit breaks the Gift.
description: Weaken a spirit within the same realm, giving them a two-dice penalty to resist the user's will. This can also stop a spirit unless they are able to break free with a resistance roll. This is granted by a weaver-spirit of law.

name: Mother's Touch
notes: If the amount of successes is greater than the subject's Rage, it is possible to heal one Aggravated instead of one Superficial. This gift can also be used in any form.
description: Heal other creatures with a Gift test, for as many successes rolled. However, this Gift cannot heal spirits or the undead. This is granted by a bear-spirit.

name: Shadow Sense
notes: The Difficulty of the Gift test is 2, but can be modified by powers that allow creatures to hide their supernatural features.
description: Determine if supernatural creatures or elements are nearby without pinpointing the exact location or identity. This is granted by a raven-spirit.

name: Sight from Beyond
notes: When given freely, the Storyteller determines if a Gift test is needed, with the amount of successes determining how clear it is and what clues are gained.
description: The Garou receives unclear visions, that can warn for future choices or immediate danger. This can be used either by choice once per scene by spending 1 Willpower and making the Gift test or given freely by the Storyteller. This is granted by a dream-spirit.

name: Entreat
notes: Although the spirit does not need to be willing, it cannot be in active conflict with the Gift user.
description: Temporarily bond with a spirit to gain some of its abilities.

name: Summon Implement
notes: The summoned item must belong to or be Dedicated to the Gift user.
description: Instantly summon a talisman or Dedicated item.

name: Grasp from Beyond
notes: Willpower amount needed depends on the size of the object with a small object being 1 and large objects being 3.
description: Bring objects in and out of the Umbra. This is granted by a magpie, beaver, or possum spirit.

name: Mindspeak
duration: One scene or until contact breaks
notes: This Gift does not allow the user to read minds. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Send and receive thoughts to a single subject, which can establish two-way communication.

name: Umbral Tether
notes: This also grants their Wisdom rating as bonus dice to navigate the Spirit Wilds. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Create a thread that allows the user to find their way back to the Umbra entry point.

name: Bolt Hole
notes: Additional people up to the margin of the win can be brought inside by holding onto the user while the Gift is used.
description: Retreat into a personal, room-sized pocket of the Umbra.

name: Command Spirit
notes: This Gift does not work to summon spirits, banish spirits, or inflict harm on themselves.
description: Allows the Garou to issue commands to a spirit that must be followed through upon. This is granted by a Incarna avatar.

name: Drain Spirit
notes: Failure of the contest gives one point of Aggravated Willpower damage to the user. This can only affect the same spirit once per scene.
description: Suck the essence of a spirit and heal superficial Willpower. This is granted by a leach or lamprey-spirit.

name: Feral Regression
notes: The effects last for the rest of the story, they can be become permanent dependent on the Storyteller. Attributes cannot go below 0.
description: Erode a victims Mental Attributes, turning them more animal-like. This is granted by Various Wyld gafflings.

name: Living Ward
notes: They cannot perform any other actions during this.
description: The Garou can turn themselves into a ward against spirits, preventing them from coming within three meters. This is granted by a legendary wolf-spirit.

name: Gaia's Candor
notes: No test is required for humans unaware of the Garou. Victims can refuse to answer.
description: Determine if someone believes their answer is the truth based on scent. This is granted by a truth-spirit.

name: Porcupine's Reprisal
notes: The damage dealt cannot surpass the amount of damage received from the initial attack.
description: When receiving brawl or melee damage, the user can make a Rage Check to deal superficial damage equal to their Glory back on the attacker. This is granted by a hedgehog-spirit.

name: Sense the True Form
notes: If they have not met the creature before they may not identify the scent. The Gift can be used in any form.
description: Determine if someone is something other than a mundane human through sense of smell. This is granted by a vulture-spirit.

name: Indomitable Spirit
notes: The Gift user ignores physical impairment penalties upon activation.
description: Ignore the effects of injury.

name: Beast's Fealty
notes: This lasts until until the Garou releases the animal or it dies, this can only be used on one animal at a time.
description: Command the loyalty of a single animal. This is granted by a falcon or lion-spirit of law.

name: Command the Gathering
duration: One scene or until it is broken or lapses
notes: Add the Garou's Glory to their dice pools to any public speech/presentation with the Skills Persuasion or Performance. Cannot be used in combat and breaks when any physical altercation begins.
description: Draw the attention of those within hearing and viewing distance, regardless if they speak the same language. This is granted by a bird-of-paradise-spirit or another eye catching spirit.

name: Fangs of Judgment
duration: Until the target dies or the sentence is revoked.
notes: A successful Gift test at Difficulty 3, grants the pack a +1 damage against the target. This can only be used one target and cannot stack by others using the same Gift.
description: Bolster their allies claws and fangs against a single enemy who has previously harmed the pack. This is granted by any number of predator-spirits.

name: Scent of the Past
notes: The Difficulty is determined by the information sought, with each point of margin revealing more information. This can be used in lupus form.
description: By smelling an object, the Garou can determine events that unfolded in the area. This is granted by a crow-spirit or other spirits that thrive in multiple environments.

name: Calcify
notes: Cannot affect a material beyond a radius of one meter.
description: Make a physical feature more difficult to open, destroy, or otherwise bypass.

name: Geas
duration: Completion of task, scene ends, or geas is lifted.
notes: Other supernatural creatures or those aware of the Garou can resist the command, or if it goes against their nature or would cause harm those they love.
description: Command another to perform a task, but it cannot be used to extract information. Commands that would result in direct harm automatically fail. This is granted by a weaver-spirit and spirits that observed rigid hierarchies.

name: Oathbreaker's Bane
duration: Indefinite or until oath is broken
notes: The oath giver receives a bonus to track down the oathbreaker equal to their Honor.
description: Bind another to a promise, one that they understand and accept. This is granted by a elephant or snake-spirit.

name: Strength of Purpose
notes: This Gift can only be used once per session. This Gift can be used in any form.
description: Roll one die for each point of Honor and heal one point of Superficial Willpower damage for each success or one of Aggravated Willpower per two success. This is granted by a stone or fire-spirit.

name: Take the True Form
duration: Margin number of turns or until user changes form
notes: This Gift can be used in homid or lupus form.
description: Force a shapeshifting creature to return to its "natural" form. This is granted by a river-spirit.

name: Animal Magnetism
notes: Grants Glory as bonus dice against humans with Social Skill tests.
description: Exudes a feral aura that draws the attention of humans. This is granted by a peacock-spirit or spirit associated with attraction.

name: Howl of Assembly
notes: This can only affect a character once per session. This Gift can be used in lupus form.
description: Heal a Willpower point of other Garou who join in the presence of the user, each margin increase the range by 100 meters. This is granted by a song-spirit or a spirit of an animal known for its unique call.

name: Song of Rage
notes: Two points of Rage are given on a critical win. Characters can only be affected by this once per session.
description: The Garou can sing a song to increase nearby packmates rage by 1.

name: Song of Serenity
notes: Two points of Rage are lost on a critical win with a minimum of 1. This power can also help snap pack members out of frenzy. Characters can only be affected by this once per session.
description: The Garou can sing a song to decrease nearby packmates rage by 1.

name: Howl of Despair
notes: Affects everyone in earshot except for the Gift user's pack. Can also be used in lupus form.
description: Inflict Willpower damage on non-allies in earshot with a howl.

name: Lullaby
duration: Until awoken or the scene ends
notes: The victim can be awoken as easily as normal sleep, unless a critical win was scored against them. Supernatural targets ignore this critical condition and can resist the Gift entirely by spending Willpower.
description: Force a target to fall asleep.

name: Call the Ridden
notes: Those unable to resist will make every effort to reach the user, but will not go through any obvious hazards.
description: Attract creatures possessed by spirits. This is granted by any spirit with the ability to posses.

name: Eyes of the Cobra
notes: Those who are aware of the Garou or supernatural creatures can attempt to resist. Any violence towards the victim or other life threatening situations break the trance.
description: Draw in a victim as if they are in a trance. This is granted by a snake-spirit.

name: Song of Inspiration
notes: On a win, other members of the pack gain a bonus die for tests using that Skill, a critical win increases the bonus to two dice.
description: The Garou can sing a song to buff either a Mental or Social Skill for their packmates.

name: Against the Odds
notes: Each success of the test heals one Superficial Willpower. This can only be used once per story.
description: Restore superficial Willpower of the Gift user and pack. This is granted by a warthog or badger-spirit.

name: Break the Shackles
notes: The Storyteller can allow the victim to add their Resolve to the Gift test pool if they are actively trying to resist as well.
description: Break mind control or coercion from another supernatural. This is granted by any winged spirit, or spirits associated with Gorgon.

name: Defy Death
notes: Each success heals one level of Health damage. This can only be used once per session and can be used in any form.
description: Rapidly heal when they are fully filled with Aggravated damage. This is granted by a wolf or bear-spirit.

name: Dreamwalk
notes: If the attempt is to scare the victim, they gain no Willpower and lose an additional Willpower for each success of margin. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Use a spirit to enter another's dreams, leaving messages to scare them or better understand them. This is granted by a dream-spirit.

name: Halt the Coward's Flight
notes: This generally works on any mundane victim, whereas supernatural creatures can attempt to resist as determined by the Storyteller.
description: Those attempting to flee have their movement reduced to walking speed and airborne targets brought down to the ground. This is granted by a bog-spirit.

name: Rapid Shift
notes: The Difficulty is dependent on the form; homid is 1, glabro and hispo is 2, and crinos is 3. Minor action penalty is removed, this can be used in any form.
description: Rapidly shapeshift with a risk for damage. This is granted by any Gaian spirit.

name: Razor Claws
notes: This is free and instant for crinos and deal damage equal to half their Glory (rounded up).
description: Grow supernaturally sharp claws. This is granted by a predatory animal spirit.

name: Sense Danger
notes: This should only be added when failure will result in immediate danger.
description: Add the users Wisdom to any attempt to detect traps, ambushes or other surprise attacks. This is granted by a prey animal spirit.

name: Tug the Leash
notes: The Gift user can make a test to choose a target to attack, but must still attack someone.
description: Gain control over oneself while frenzying and leave frenzy more easily.

name: Snarl of Challenge
notes: The additional Health only absorbs one point of Superficial damage each. They do not protect against Aggravated damage.
description: Reduce attackers pools by two dice when they attack anyone but the user. Gain additional Health equal to the Honor upon success. This is granted by a bear-spirit.

name: True Fear
notes: Mundane victims are automatically affected, supernatural creatures and those aware of the Garou may resist. Supernatural may shake off the effect after one turn by spending one point of Willpower.
description: Instill fear to drive the victim away or terror that freezes the victim in place. This is granted by spirits of Fear.

name: Wind Claws
notes: This is instant and free for crinos form.
description: Ignore armor and damage reduction by an amount equal to the user's Wisdom. This is granted by a wind-spirit.

name: Light of the Moon
notes: Ends early if the Gift user is incapacitated or chooses to end the Gift.
description: Glow brightly enough to blind anyone looking directly at oneself and damage nearby vampires.

name: Closing the Gap
notes: The amount covered is equal to 3 meters times their total Glory. They cannot go through things not physically possible to traverse.
description: Move long distances to close the gap between them and an enemy. This is granted by a grasshopper or mantis-spirit.

name: Kiss of Helios
notes: Anyone who strikes barehanded takes Superficial damage equal to the user's Glory.
description: Take no damage from fire and reduce damage from stronger sources by the Glory per turn. This is granted by a sun ray-spirit.

name: Luna's Armor
notes: The amount turned is equal to their Honor, but it is not halved.
description: Turn Aggravated damage from fire or silver into Superficial. This is granted by a Lune.

name: Silver Claws
notes: This is free and instant for crinos form.
description: Turn the Garou's claws into silver to deal massive damage to other Garou. This is granted by a spite-spirit or elemental spirit of silver.

name: Catfeet
notes: This gift can be activated reflexively if surprised with a Wits + Survival test Difficulty 3. Can be used in any form.
description: Automatically succeed any test to keep their balance, as long as it can hold their weight. This is granted by a cat-spirit.

name: An Exchange with Luna
notes: Regain all Rage lost this way with a Resolve + Honor test at Difficulty 3, while one can see the moon. Can be used in any form.
description: Send one's Rage away, to be summoned back later.

name: Eyes of the Owl
notes: Should the source be supernatural, they can their Wisdom as bonus dice if there is a resistance pool.
description: Grants the ability to see in complete darkness. This is granted by an owl- or cat-spirit.

name: Hare's Leap
notes: For every success on the test, they leap 3 meters.
description: Leap great distances horizontally or vertically. This is granted by a leaping animal spirit.

name: The Howl Carries
notes: Garou and some spirits can notice the unusual nature of the relayed howl, but not humans. The effect can be contained to the bawn of one's caern by making a Rage Check.
description: Have a howl-based message travel further by being repeated by ordinary wolves.

name: Penumbral Senses
notes: The test is performed against the Difficulty of the local Gauntlet (2-5 generally).
description: This allows the Garou to perceive both the physical realm and the Umbra at the same time without penalty. This is granted by a pattern spider.

name: Raging Strike
notes: Gain a dice bonus equal to their Glory on a single Brawl attack. This is granted by a dire wolf-spirit.
description: Garou channel their Rage into their strikes.

name: Resist Toxin
notes: A test to resist can be made against an appropriate Difficulty if one would not normally occur. Recreational drugs can be resisted by making a Rage Check and rolling against Difficulty 2.
description: Become more resistant to poisons, diseases, drugs, and similar toxic substances.

name: Shredding Skin
notes: Associated with the Wyrm. The pain that this Gift inflicts does not grant Rage.
description: Sacrifice health instead of Rage to change form.

name: Staredown
notes: When used against supernatural creatures or mortals aware of the Garou, a test must be made. A subject can be targeted by this power only once per scene and itcannot be used during physical combat. This can be used in any form.
description: When used on a single human or animal, they get out of the Garou's way while cowering from them. Succeeds automatically on unaware mortals. This is granted by a legendary wolf-spirit.

name: Bestial Regression
notes: Humans rationalize being affected by this Gift due to the Delirium, while supernatural beings can ignore it with Willpower but suffer a penalty to social rolls for the remainder. Can be used in any form.
description: Make a touched victim unable to communicate in any way beyond simple grunts and growls

name: Bite of the Lycan
duration: One night per margin of success
notes: Associated with the Wyrm. The effects of this Gift intensify with each passing night, with the victim only fully succumbing from the third night onwards.
description: Induce violent impulses in a bitten human.

name: Gnaw
notes: Can be used in crinos, hispo or lupus form.
description: Gain a bonus to chew through any physical barrier or restraint.

name: Sharpened Senses
notes: The Difficulty of all Awareness tests are lowered by the character's Wisdom, minimum of 2. This can be used in any form.
description: Heightens the werewolf's senses. While in Glabro they gain the senses of awolf, whereas in crinos, hispo or lupus sharpen to that of a human. This is granted by a wolf-spirit.

name: Spirit of the Fray
notes: A single attack roll is made an applied to every opponent engaged and covered by the cost. Any other bonuses of the attack apply to all opponents.
description: The Garou can attack additional opponents within range, up to the character's Glory without a penalty. This is granted by an wolverine- or badger-spirit.

name: Thwarting the Arrow
notes: This Gift can only be used in crinos form.
description: Grant a bonus equal to their Honor to all test to avoid projectile weapons. This is granted by a Weaver vector-spirit.

name: Urban Hunter
notes: Associated with the Wyrm.
description: Gain a bonus to hunting a certain quarry while within an urban setting.

name: Body Shift
notes: The Gift test is made at Difficulty 2. For each success of the margin they can redistribute one dot from one Physical Attribute to another. No Attribute can be reduced below 0 or taken above 5. Up to the Storytellers discretion, this Gift also allows the user to fit into small spaces, with the Difficulty based on the dimensions of the space.
description: Finetunethe shape of physical body to become stronger, smaller, or more dense without changing forms completely. This is granted by a water-spirit.

name: Jam Technology
notes: The Gift test is madeagainst a Difficulty as determined by the device complexity level, all equipment within 20 meters stops working based on the number of successes. It is possible to take out a wider range of devices than intended. Refer to the chart on page 148 of the Corebook.
description: Temporarily wreak havoc on technology so that it no longer works. Once the duration expires, its normal operation resumes. This is granted by a Wyld spirit of discord.

name: Tongue of the Beasts
notes: They can be convinced to aid in a task or yield information withthe Difficulties ranging from 2 to 5 depending on how close it is to mammals or how dire the information/task is.
description: Communicate and speak freely with any animal as if they were a person, only limited by the animal's perspective and mind. This is granted by a lion- or moose-spirit.

name: Gremlins
notes: The difficulty of this test is determined by the device complexity level, refer to page 150 of the Corebook for the chart. This gift can also be used in lupus form.
description: A device within sight and five meters can be rendered useless, if the result is a critical win the device becomes inoperable and beyond repair. This is granted by a havoc-spirit.

name: Corrupted Memories
notes: Associated with the Wyrm. Alters one scene's worth of memories, and can only be used on humans who have no experience with or knowledge of the Garou.
description: Replace oneself with someone else in the recent memories of a victim.

name: Jump Scare
notes: The victim can resist this Gift's effects by spending Willpower, but then cannot spend Willpower to reroll dice. Can be used in any form.
description: Show a victim a brief glimpse of the depths of the Umbra to terrify them.

name: Hungry Teeth
notes: Associated with the Wyrm. Free and instantaneous in crinos form.
description: Turn one's teeth more dangerous against spirits and fomori and regain Willpower from killing supernatural entities.

name: Banish Spirit
notes: The spirit can cause Aggravated damage to it's host equal to Power minus the margin of the test.
description: The Garou can send present spirits possessing a host on the same realm back to the Umbra. This is granted by a Incarna avatar.

name: Ghost Walk
notes: The state of intangibility only applies to inorganic surfaces, so this Gift cannot be used to avoid grapples or attacks.
description: Turn intangible to pass through a solid surface.

name: Ancestral Conviction
notes: This can be used in any form.
description: Gain their Honor as bonus dice on Persuasion Skill tests against other Garou. This is granted by a legendary wolf-spirit.

name: Wyrm-Speech
notes: Associated with the Wyrm. Critical successes can deal partial Aggravated damage or permanently destroy Talismans.
description: Damage spirits and Talismans with a roar or chant.

name: Cutting Words
duration: One turn per point of margin
notes: Associated with the Wyrm. The inflicted blood loss only causes actual damage on a Brutal Outcome. Aside from the blood, the conversation appears normal to those without supernatural senses.
description: Inflict social and mental impairment on a target in a conversation, along with visible blood loss

name: Song of Valor
notes: Willpower rerolls can roll any amount of dice, rather than just 3. It cannot be used to reroll Brutal results. This Gift can only be used once per session.
description: The Garou can sing a song to buff their packmates Willpower rerolls.

name: Mouth Full of Teeth
duration: One scene or until the fangs' damage becomes 0
notes: Associated with the Wyrm. Every bite attack reduces the damage bonus by 1, and once it reaches 0 the Gift user cannot make any bite attacks until they rest in their breed form.
description: Fill one's mouth with deadly but fragile additional fangs.

name: Primal Anger
notes: The amount of Rage gained is dependent on the number of successes on a Glory test. This can only be used once per session.
description: Inflict one Aggravated Damage to a victim and gain Rage. This is granted by a legendary wolf-spirit.

name: Curse of Aeolus
notes: Those in the fog suffer a negative two dice penalty to Awareness and Firearms tests. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Call upon a fog to cover the area. This is granted by a fog-spirit.

name: Coup de Grâce
duration: Next Brawl or Melee attack, or the scene ends
notes: Only works if the damage would reduce the opponents Health to 0.
description: Add the Glory rating into their next attack to end the opponent in one hit. This is granted by any spirit associated with pride.

name: Kali's Scar
notes: The user also gains bonus dice equal to their Glory in attempts to track or locate the victim while the Gift is active.
description: Any damage dealt by these claws cannot be healed even with supernatural means. This is granted by a rot-spirit.

name: Wasp Talons
notes: Gain one Superficial damage from their claws being damaged and cannot use claw attacks until this is healed.
description: Make ranged attacks with their claws. This is granted by a wasp-spirit.

name: Gorgon's Visage
notes: Those who break free cannot be paralyzed again for the remainder of the scene.
description: Paralyze someone by making eye contact. This is granted by an avatar of Gorgon.

name: Odious Aroma
notes: This Gift can only be applied outside of combat. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Stop others from coming near the Garou by releasing a horrible stench. This is granted by a skunk-spirit.

name: Face in the Crowd
notes: This can only be used in homid form or lupus form, depending on which group they are blending into.
description: Disappear into a crowd to shake off pursuers, adding their Honor rating to the Difficulty rating to find them. This is granted by a roach-spirit.

name: Streets Tell Stories
notes: Upon success the conversation can be heard as if they were there, but it does not pick up ambient sounds such as cars or the other end of a phone conversation. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Listen in on nearby conversations by placing their ear to the ground. This is granted by a city-spirit.

name: A Thousand Eyes
notes: Should the animal be killed while the Gift is being used, the user suffers one point of Aggravated Willpower damage.
description: See through the eyes of any animal nearby as long as they are cockroach sized are larger. This is granted by an ant-spirit.

name: Between the Cracks
notes: The Garou must be able to see both cracks.
description: Disappear and reappear through a crack that is the result from wear or damage. This is granted by a spirit of shadow, decay, or ruin.

name: Brother's Scent
notes: This Gift only works in Homid form unless it's a Garou gathering, this also doesn't prevent them from being noticed for acting unfit to the situation or if the person looking already knows them by sight.
description: Blend into a group as long as their form matches those around them. This is granted by an avatar of Unicorn.

name: Calm the Furious Beast
notes: The Gift test is made against the target's current Rage or Difficulty 3 for other supernaturals. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Bring another supernatural creature out of Frenzy. This is granted by a legendary wolf spirit.

name: Reveal Trauma
notes: Any attempt to help heal or repair gains a two-dice bonus. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Learn of a targets greatest physical, mental, or supernatural ailment. This is granted by a spirit of suffering.

name: Life's Presence
notes: Only those that feign a living body can be detected, either through possessing a body or feigning life.
description: The user becomes aware of all mundane life as well as any supernatural. This is granted by a spirit of the soil.

name: Share the Pain
notes: The Garou picks a number of packmates equal to their Wisdom. Any defensive Gifts used by the user apply as normal.
description: Take away half of the physical damage a packmate would receive and the user takes it as either as Health or Willpower. This is granted by a bee-spirit.

name: Camouflage
notes: By spending a full turn and 1 Willpower they can increase this to their entire pack, should they move or make any sound it breaks. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Blend into the wilderness. This is granted by a deer-spirit.

name: Lacerating Wind
notes: It can also be used against a single target to knock them off their feet or off whatever they are standing on.
description: Target a group of foes with powerful wind that reduces their physical attack pools by 2. This is granted by an avatar of the north wind.

name: Chill Cloak
notes: By spending a full turn and 1 Willpower they can extended this effect to all packmates nearby.
description: Add their Honor rating to any Stealth, Survival, or Larceny attempt when avoiding heat based, movement based or light based sensors. This is granted by a alligator-spirit or other cold-blooded predatory spirit.

name: Blood of the Wastes
notes: Add their Honor rating to any tests of Survival to find food or water, also reduce environmental penalties by their Honor rating. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: The user becomes immune everything but the most extreme environmental conditions. They are able to travel for long periods of time without shelter. This is granted by hardly or hibernating spirit such as a bear or turtle-spirit.

name: Claws of Frozen Death
notes: This is instant and free in Crinos form.
description: Create claws that when they hit someone they receive a two-dice penalty to defend or dodge future attacks. This is granted by a ice or winter-spirit.

name: Augur
notes: They cannot hear or smell what is going on, only able to see. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Look into a reflective surface and see through another reflective surface in another area. This is granted by a water-spirit or spirit associated with knowledge.

name: Blackout
notes: Those who cannot see in the dark and/or do not have a light source are subject to a penalty. This Gift can be used in any form.
description: Extinguish one light source within eyesight per dot of Wisdom. This is granted by a spirit associated with darkness or are nocturnal animal.

name: Serpent's Coil
duration: One scene until ended or destroyed
notes: The serpents share three Health levels and use the user's Wits + Wisdom to avoid and take attacks, but can only be attacked with fire or supernatural attacks that hurt the incorporeal.
description: Summon a snake like fog to restrict opponents. This is granted by a constrictor snake-spirit.

name: Hands of the Earth
notes: The Garou must concentrate for the full turn to use the Gift and do nothing else while using it.
description: Move large or small objects at a distance. This is granted by a earth or stone-spirit.

name: Shrouded Aspect
duration: A number of turns equal to the Wisdom of the user
notes: The Garou can not move faster than a walking pace or it will break.
description: The Garou becomes invisible to onlookers and conventional cameras. This is granted by a smoke-spirit.

name: Skinbind
notes: Store an amount of objects up to their Wisdom rating and non-mundane may come with side effects. Storing the item takes a full turn but retrieving it is a minor action.
description: Transform mundane items into a tattoo-like image on their skin, the items cannot be too heavy for them to lift and the weight is still felt. This is granted by a moth-spirit or a spirit associated with drawing/writing.

name: Energize
notes: This Gift does not repair destroyed items and does not equate them having knowledge to use it.
description: Power any object as if it was plugged in or fueled up.

name: Control Machine
notes: The commands cannot harm the machine.
description: Issue simple commands to machines. This is granted by a machine-spirit.

name: Doppelganger
notes: The Gift user must know the subject being copied by face. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Take on the likeness of another humanoid or wolf. This is granted by a shadow or mockingbird-spirit.

name: Recover Memory
notes: This Gift does not give the ability to understand the material, additional tests may be required. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Retrieve damaged or destroyed information from an object. This is granted by a data-spirit.

name: Sacred Boundary
duration: A day or a night or until broken
notes: This lasts either for a day and a night unless the objects anchoring it are moved/destroyed. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Create a boundary that when broken while still active gives the user a glimpse of the movement. This is granted by a dog-spirit.

name: Blessed Brew
notes: This Gift can only be used once per session and can also be used in any form.
description: Infuse a drink so that it increases resistance to fear or supernatural mental abilities by adding the Gift users Glory to the resistance pool . This is granted by a hearth or herb-spirit.

name: Territorial Dominance
duration: A number of nights equal to the user's Glory
notes: Damage to the territory gives Willpower damage to the user.
description: The user gains a bonus die on marked territory. This is granted by a lion-spirit or other feral cat-spirit.

name: Balor's Gaze
notes: Only one subject can be affected at any given time.
description: Look upon someone and cause horrible paint with a 2 dice penalty to all tests. This is granted by a pain-spirit or spirit of age and time.

name: The Living Wood
notes: If there are no suitable plants or trees the gift fails.
description: Use nature to protect themselves, anyone attempting to harm them must deal with grapple attacks from nearby trees and plants. This is granted by a Glade Child.

name: Hidden Killer
notes: Mundane attempts to gather information fail, those familiar with the Garou can make the attempt but suffer a dice penalty equal to the Gift user's Honor.
description: Cover up how someone died. This is granted by a beetle or spider-spirit.

name: Render Down
notes: The process takes a few minutes, where the user must maintain contact with the object.
description: Rot or erode any inert material they touch. This is granted by a insect-spirit or a spirit associated with carrion.

name: Gaia's Embrace
notes: Maintaining this Gift requires the users' full attention and lapses when they perform another action or use another Gift.
description: Pull those flying to the ground. This is granted by a rock and mountain-spirit.

name: Quicksand
notes: This Gift can only be used on natural ground, not indoors or paved surfaces.
description: Turn the ground into a sticky surface that gives a 2-dice penalty to all physical defense pools and reduces movement to a slow walking pace. This is granted by a earth elemental.

name: Shield of the Wyld
notes: Natural weapons such as claws and fangs are unaffected and while this is active the user cannot use tools or technological devices.
description: Ignore physical damage levels equal to the user's Honor each turn as long as it's caused by mundane weapons. This is granted by a Serpentine-spirit.

name: Fatal Flaw
notes: During the full turn studying they can do nothing else. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Learn a method not yet known to deal Aggravated damage to a target, if there is nothing they gain a bonus die to attacks. This is granted by a termite-spirit.

name: Icy Chill of Despair
notes: Those nearby, other than the packmates, cannot reroll using Willpower or regain Willpower other than through mystical means.
description: Gain Glory as bonus dice for Intimidation tests. This is granted by a Stormcrow.

name: Dire Distraction
notes: A subject can only be affected by this Gift once per scene. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Cause a distraction that makes the target lose dice equal to the user's Glory on their next action. This is granted by a shadow-spirit.

name: Thunderclap
notes: Those who pass receive a two-dice penalty to any action other than to defend for a turn, unless it's a critical. Everyone else is knocked to the ground.
description: Stun everyone within 20 meters. This is granted by a Incarna of Thunder.

name: Under the Gun
duration: One day per dot of Glory
notes: Can be removed by the Rite of Abjuration.
description: Touch someone and they can no longer use Gifts to dodge projectiles, attackers also gain two bonus dice against the victim with projectiles. This is granted by a raven-spirit.

name: Fetch Bounty
notes: This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Locate mundane nonliving objects. This is granted by a magpie-spirit.

name: Speech of the World
notes: This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Read and speak any living language. This is granted by a parrot-spirit.

name: Whispered Passage
notes: This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Muffle the natural sounds when moving. This is granted by a cat-spirit.

name: Burrow
notes: The tunnels are unstable and only last one scene.
description: Rapidly tunnel into the earth to get past obstacles or seek shelter. This is granted by a mole-spirit.

name: The Golden Path
notes: This bonus can be shared with packmates if the user can communicate with them. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Add the users Wisdom rating to test to navigate an area with static danger or obstacles. This is granted by a ant-spirit.

name: Pack Instinct
notes: They must be within a 10-kilometer radius. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: The Garou has instinctual knowledge of the whereabouts of their packmates. This is granted by a bee or other hive insect-spirit.

name: The Silver Compact
notes: This also allows the user to ignore Health or Willpower damage equal to their Honor rating each turn. This Gift can also be used in any form.
description: Invoke a compact and receive protection from an otherwise hostile spirit. This is granted by a -spirit.

name: Blood of the Pack
notes: The total amount of Rage Checks able to be made this way are equal to the Gift user's Honor. It cannot be used if Unity of the Pack has been used in the same scene. This Gift can be used in any form.
description: Members of the pack can make Rage Checks for one another. This is granted by a wasp-spirit.

name: Unity of the Pack
notes: The total amount of Willpower spent this way is equal to the Gift user's Honor. It cannot be used if Blood of the Pack has been used in the same scene. This Gift can be used in any form.
description: Members of the pack can spend Willpower for one another. This is granted by any familial spirit.

name: Luna's Avenger
notes: The bonus dice cannot exceed the Gift user's Honor.
description: Gain a bonus of one die for each Impaired packmate and two for each member with their Health tracker filled with Aggravated damage for all physical combat attacks and defense tests. This is granted by a Lune.
